_documentation.purpose: Reset to baseline. No modifications, all streams return to normal rates.
_documentation.usage: Loaded by ScenarioEngine when admin clicks 'Reset to Baseline' button. Clears all active scenarios.
_documentation.example: When activated, all stream multipliers return to 1.0 (no modifications), all external events cleared.

name: Normal Operations
description: Reset to baseline. No modifications, all streams return to normal rates.
